description:
You are in Dashboard/ Appointment calendar/ Create new appointment calendar
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Select the calendar for offers/services.
Use the calendar for offers/services if you want to offer different services. Here, the time duration per offer/service can be different. You can also optionally enter a price for each offer/service.
2. Assign a title for the appointment booking calendar.
3. Choose a color for the appointment booking calendar. For example, your company's main color or a neutral shade.
4. Change the button text, if desired. You can see a preview of the previous settings directly below.
5. Add other calendar information. These appear optionally at the beginning of the booking process and, if so specified by you, must be confirmed by your customers.
Example: "Please cancel the appointment in time if you are unable to attend!"
Example: "Please bring the following documents to your appointment: ..."
6. Click on ***Add 1st Service***. This opens the settings mode for editing the first service or offer.
Optionally, you can then add further services or offers.
7. Enter a title for the service.
8. Enter the duration of the service.
9. Optionally, you can enter a price for the service. 10.
10. Services are sorted into service categories. This allows you to define later which service categories are displayed in the appointment booking calendar. Assign your own name for this via the link Add category.
11. You can provide the customer with additional information via the description.
12. A picture can be added to each service. This will later appear above the service in the appointment booking calendar.
13. Services can be duplicated and deleted via this link.
14. select the days on which you offer the services.
15. Enter the exact times when a service can take place.
16. Select the category of service that you want to appear in the calendar. The different services are grouped in the service categories.
17. Specify any break times. These can be different for each day of the week.
18. Limit the time period for the appointment booking. This can be useful if you only want to offer online appointment booking via Bookingflix for a certain period of time.
19. Select whether your customers are shown how many appointments are still available per slot.
20. If desired, an appointment request is automatically confirmed to the customer by email. A manual confirmation is then no longer necessary.
21. You can deactivate the appointment verification by email. This way the customer books an appointment and does not have to click on the automatically sent email confirmation link. Please note that the verification is required by the GDPR. Therefore, if necessary, only use this function for internal purposes. 
You can also specify how long the customer has to click on the verification email confirmation link. After that, the appointment will be released for booking again. Before the expiry of the time limit, the customer will be reminded by email a second time that verification has not yet taken place.
22. Assign an address for the store or location. This address will be displayed to the customer at the time of booking, including a link to Google Maps. This address is also listed in the appointment confirmation email.
23. State the name of the contact person responsible. This will be listed when the appointment is booked, in the email appointment confirmation.
24. Enter the email address of the contact person in charge. This will be listed in the e-mail appointment confirmation when the appointment is booked. If the customer replies directly to this email appointment confirmation, the specified email address will be pre-filled as the recipient in the reply email.
25. Using the arrow buttons, you can change the order of the form fields.
Using the Duplicate button, they duplicate the respective form field.
Click on the trash can button to delete a form field.
26. Form fields can be created as mandatory or optional fields. Mandatory fields must be filled in by the customer during the booking process. Otherwise it will not be possible to submit the form.
27. To help customers, a description text can be added to each form field.
28. Ask your customers about their satisfaction with the appointment. The questions can be chosen freely. It is also possible to do without a customer survey altogether. The customer receives a link to the evaluation tool one day after the appointment and can thus submit an evaluation.
29. The customer ratings can be displayed below the appointment booking calendar. This way, new customers can see the ratings of previous customers when booking an appointment.
You can also use only the customer ratings for internal purposes, e.g. improving the service, and not publish them.
Customer ratings can be viewed and managed by you via HitKlick.com.
Customer ratings cannot be deleted. Only a deactivation of the display is possible at any time.
30. To finish, the created appointment booking calendar is displayed in preview mode.
31. Changes can be made now, but also later, through the dashboard. To do this, click on the appropriate tab.
32. When you are satisfied with the result, you can create an account with Bookingflix. For this, choose a username, email address and password. Then click Register.
You will then receive a confirmation mail with the registration link. In a second mail you will receive at the same time your embed code to embed the appointment booking calendar and the link to the appointment booking website. Both can be edited in the dashboard on: [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

The username cannot be changed later.
title: Create an appointment booking calendar for services
